refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Closes a display manager. If invoked with no arguments, the current display manager is closed. Otherwise, name (i.e., the Tcl/Tk path name of the display manager window)is closed.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The two examples show the use of the release command to close either the current display manager (first example) or the one specified with the command (second example).
